Package domain

Class CtrlDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.CtrlDomain
  • public class CtrlDomain
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain Controller Class. It is in charge of communicating with the layers of Presentation and Persistence, through their correspondent Controllers (CtrlPresentation and CtrlPersistence respectively) and to delegate use cases to their responsible.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CtrlDomain()
      Default Domain Controller constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void createUser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Function used to create new Users into the system
      void generateKakuro​(int numRows, int numColumns)
      This method uses a generation algorithm of a Kakuro, according to the following parameters.
      java.lang.String[][] listKakuro()
      Consultant function
      void listPersonalStats()
      Consultant function of the personal ranking of punctuations for one user from all his games.
      void listRanking()
      Consultant function of the ranking of punctuations that all the different users made in their games.
      void loadUser​(java.lang.String name)
      Function used to swap the current User with the new one indicated
      void playKakuro​(int idGame)
      Function used to simulate a game for a kakuro
      void proposeKakuro​(int numRows, int numColumns, java.lang.String[][] field)
      If the proposed Kakuro by the User at the Presentation Layer is valid, it is saved at the Persistence Layer and it's added to the collection of Kakuros that a User has.
      void saveGame​(int idGame)
      Function used to save the current state of a game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CtrlDomain

        public CtrlDomain()
        Default Domain Controller constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • proposeKakuro

        public void proposeKakuro​(int numRows,
                          int numColumns,
                          java.lang.String[][] field)
        If the proposed Kakuro by the User at the Presentation Layer is valid, it is saved at the Persistence Layer and it's added to the collection of Kakuros that a User has.
        Parameters:
        numRows - indicates the number of rows that the field has
        numColumns - indicates the number of columns that the field has
        field - it has the value of each cell divided by ",".

      • generateKakuro

        public void generateKakuro​(int numRows,
                           int numColumns)
        This method uses a generation algorithm of a Kakuro, according to the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        numRows - It indicates the number of rows that the Kakuro will have.
        numColumns - It indicates the number of columns that the Kakuro will have.

      • listKakuro

        public java.lang.String[][] listKakuro()
        Consultant function
        Returns:
        It returns a matrix of the information of all the cells of the kakuro

      • createUser

        public void createUser​(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Function used to create new Users into the system
        Parameters:
        name - indicates the name of the new user
        password - indicates the password of the user

      • loadUser

        public void loadUser​(java.lang.String name)
        Function used to swap the current User with the new one indicated
        Parameters:
        name - indicates the name of the user to load

      • playKakuro

        public void playKakuro​(int idGame)
        Function used to simulate a game for a kakuro
        Parameters:
        idGame - indicates the identifier of the kakuro to load and play

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame​(int idGame)
        Function used to save the current state of a game.
        Parameters:
        idGame - indicates the identifier of the kakuro to save

      • listRanking

        public void listRanking()
        Consultant function of the ranking of punctuations that all the different users made in their games.

      • listPersonalStats

        public void listPersonalStats()
        Consultant function of the personal ranking of punctuations for one user from all his games.
